replies.body: thats in 3v3 lol u only get tokens from summoner rift 5v5
No, it's hexakill. (6v6). You can get tokens in other gamemodes including 3v3, but not rotating game modes including hexakill. That's why ABW got no token.
You can't get tokens in ARAM/TT. You can only get tokens in normals/ranked. You can only get mastery up to rank 5 on all other modes.
